title: MiLB.TV Access Points
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on MiLB.com somewhere on the site
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks one of the links to MiLB.TV:
custom_expected: THEN the user should be redirected to MiLB.TV appropriately.

title: Sign In - Premium/Single/Free *
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has an account
AND the user's account has one of the following account types:
- Premium | TBD
- Single | TBD
- Free | TBD
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be granted appropriate access to feeds

Premium | All excluding blackouts
Single | Just the team through which you subscribed 
Free | Only FGOTD excluding blackout

title: Invalid User Info *
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has triggered the Log In overlay
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters Log In credentials incorrectly
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be presented with the following error messages:

1: Empty Email
-Please enter your e-mail address.

2: Incorrect Email Format
-Your email address must be in the format of name@domain.com

3: Empty Password
-Please enter your password

4:Incorrect Credentials
-Authentication Error. Please check emails and/or password and try again.

title: Upgrade Flash Player *
custom_preconds:
https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/TVMPFIVE-2060

GIVEN the user has no Flash Player installed/enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user loads the mp5 player
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the following overlay
- Download Link: https://get.adobe.com/flashplayer
- Here Link: https://helpx.adobe.com/flash-player.html

Note that the flash message can be lifted (IF Flash is enabled already) by clicking the "Download" link in the message and selecting "Always Allow" on the flash pop-up. This is logged: *

title: Unsupported Page *
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a browser that is not supported
custom_expected: THEN the user should be redirected to TBD: (http://milb.com/tv/unsupported)?

title: Blackout Message Display in a Banner *
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has selected a game with Blackout Restrictions
AND the user falls within the regional/national blackout restriction
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Video feed for that game
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be presented with one the following messages:

1- We're sorry. We have determined that you are blacked out of watching the game you selected, due to television broadcaster restrictions. An archive copy of the game will be available 90 minutes after the game ends

2- We've determined that you are located within the local broadcast area of this game, and are therefore blacked out of this game. Live audio and full game archives are available with your subscription.

title: MiLB.TV Logo *
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the MiLB.tv page
custom_steps: WHEN the user looks at the heading of the page
custom_expected: THEN the user should see the MiLB.TV logo in the top left of the heading

title: Verify Playback with AdBlocker enabled
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has an Adblocker add-on installed in their browser and it is enabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to watch a game
custom_expected:
THEN preroll/ads will not display
AND the user should be able to view content.

title: Verify Playback with AdBlocker disabled
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has an Adblocker add-on installed in their browser and it is disabled
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to watch a game
custom_expected:
THEN preroll/ads will display
AND the user should be able to view content.

title: Play/Pause
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a VOD/Archive feed
custom_expected:
THEN the video will play/pause accordingly
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19284)

title: Social Media - Standard icons are displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded a feed in Standard View
custom_steps: WHEN the views the meta-data under the player
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the following social media icons: Facebook, Twitter, Email, Link, iframe and not G+, Link, Embed.  ![](index.php?/attachments/get/19045)

title: Volume
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded a feed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user adjusts the Volume Bar
OR the user clicks the Volume Icon
custom_expected: THEN the audio will adjust accordingly

title: Controls - Full Screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded a feed
custom_expected:
THEN the player will load in fullscreen
AND all player controls should be visible
AND all player controls should click through in the same position

title: Play/Pause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has loaded a feed
AND the user has clicked on the player
custom_expected:
THEN the selected video will play/pause accordingly
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19286)

title: Scrubber Bar
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded a feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user scrubs with the timeline
custom_expected:
THEN the player will update to the newly updated position of gameplay
AND the hover time indicator should update as the user scrubs

title: Time Indicator
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has loaded a feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user hovers over/clicks on the scrubber in the timeline
custom_expected:
IF the feed is Live
THEN no Time indicator will display above the scrubber

IF the feed is Archived
THEN a Time indicator will display above the scrubber
AND the Time indicator will be locked on top of the position of the scrubber
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19288)
